data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov just outside Akhmat Grozny's area.
Akhmat Grozny will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rostov.
Mathias Normann (Rostov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Artem Timofeev.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny’s Artem Timofeev is on his feet again at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 9, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 10, Nikolay Voloshin awards the home team a throw-in.
In Grozny Rostov attack through Roman Eremenko. The finish is off target, however.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 13, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Denis Hadzikadunic (Rostov) gets booked by Nikolay Voloshin, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 15, Ismael Silva for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 15, Zoran Nizic (Akhmat Grozny) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Mathias Normann is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 18, Mathias Normann returns to the field for Rostov after picking up a slight injury.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rostov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Nikolay Voloshin signals a Rostov throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 22, Free kick Rostov.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Rostov.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 24, Attention is being given to Akhmat Grozny’s Aleksandr Putsko and play has been suspended briefly.
Dmitri Poloz is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Dmitri Poloz is back on his feet again.
In the minute 26, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny drive forward through Ismael Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Aleksandr Putsko is back on the pitch.
In the minute 27, Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 36, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In the minute 38, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 43, Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov (Akhmat Grozny) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Aleksandr Putsko (Akhmat Grozny) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 44, Rostov have a goal kick.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Nikolay Voloshin blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
Rostov drives forward and Khoren Bayramyan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Akhmat Grozny's Marat Bystrov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 49, Nikolay Voloshin waits before resuming play because Marat Bystrov for Akhmat Grozny is still down.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 50, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Rostov.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 53, Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Rostov at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 57, Play has been interrupted briefly in Grozny to check on Armin Gigovic, who is grimacing with pain.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Rostov's Armin Gigovic is back in action after a slight knock.
Artem Polyarus is replacing Evgeny Kharin for the home team.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Rostov's half.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 61, Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Throw-in Rostov.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Pontus Almqvist is on a sub for Khoren Bayramyan for Rostov.
Valeri Karpin is making the team's second substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Danila Sukhomlinov replacing Roman Eremenko.
In the minute 65, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 69, Roman Tugarev of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a second substitution, with Lechii Sadulaev replacing Vladimir Iljin.
Free kick Rostov.
Free kick in a good position for Rostov!
In the minute 72, Rostov are coming forward and Maksim Osipenko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 74, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Rostov's half.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 75, Akhmat Grozny's Miroslav Bogosavac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 76, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Giorgi Shelia for Akhmat Grozny who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Giorgi Shelia for Akhmat Grozny is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Rostov at Akhmat-Arena.
Can Rostov capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 82, Goal! Rostov have got their heads in front thanks to a Roman Tugarev strike.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha is caught offside.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 86, Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Rostov's area.
The home team have replaced Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov with Amir Adouyev. This is the fourth substitution made today by Andrey Talalaev.
In the minute 88, Akhmat Grozny make their third substitution with Arsen Adamov replacing Artem Timofeev.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 89, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
The away team replace Dmitri Poloz with Vladimir Obukhov.
Aleksey Kozlov is replacing Roman Tugarev for Rostov at Akhmat-Arena.
